subtitleNullable: Implicit neural representation of ImageNet100 as part of work Implicit Zoo
descriptionNullable:
This data is release as part of work of ***[Implicit-Zoo: A Large-Scale Dataset of Neural Implicit Functions for 2D Images and 3D Scenes.](https://github.com/qimaqi/Implicit-Zoo)***
Following the standard procedure for ImageNet-1K classification, we resize images to 256x256 and then center crop them to 224x224 for further processing. To better fit the high-res images, we employ a 4-layer 256 width SIREN. The normalization parameters are consistent with those used for CIFAR-10. We increase the training iterations to 3000, each taking 50.24 secs for each image.
title: ImageNet100-INRs-Dataset

description:

Following the standard procedure for ImageNet-1K classification, we resize images to 256x256 and then center crop them to 224x224 for further processing. To better fit the high-res images, we employ a 4-layer 256 width SIREN. The normalization parameters are consistent with those used for CIFAR-10. We increase the training iterations to 3000, each taking 50.24 secs for each image.
